description: Beef up your gym bag with Kinetic Light Compression Mesh. Made from 4-Way stretch fabric, this Semi-Compression pair is designed for a wide range of sport and fitness activities. Equipped with Saxx's advanced BallPark Pouch™ PRO – which features a snugger, more supportive fit than the original design – guys will experience an elevated level of comfort and stability.
name: Saxx Underwear Kinetic Light-Compression Mesh Boxer Brief, 5" Inseam - Mens
